bioconda.name: bioconductor-geometadb
bioconda.summary: A compilation of metadata from NCBI GEO

biotools.summary: A thin wrapper around the SQLite database along with associated documentation. Access to the metadata associated with samples, platforms, and datasets much more feasible.

bioschemas.name: GEOmetadb
bioschemas.summary: A thin wrapper around the SQLite database along with associated documentation. Access to the metadata associated with samples, platforms, and datasets much more feasible.
